name: .TA File Extension
summary: Learn about .TA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TA file is a firmware file created by Sony to flash updates to select Sony devices, such as Xperia devices. It contains firmware that is flashed on to a Sony device to update the operating system (OS). TA files may be used to flash updates and repairs to a device.

content: You can create .FTF files from TA files for various devices using Sony Mobile Flasher. Select Tools → Bundles → Bundler, choose the TA file(s), and click Create.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
